name: Maniac Miner II
description:
The next instalment of Maniac Miner features more caves to explore, and more gems to collect!

Controls - 

Left and right arrow keys (Move)

Up arrow key (Jump)

Credits -

"Bathed in the Light", "Broken Reality", "On the Passing of Time"
